import React, { useState } from "react"; import { generateResponse } from "./api"; function App() { const [prompt, setPrompt] = useState(""); const [result, setResult] = useState(""); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = async () => { if (!prompt) return alert("Enter a prompt"); setLoading(true); setResult(""); try { const res = await generateResponse({ prompt }); setResult(res.data.result || res.data.error); } catch (err) { setResult("Server error."); } setLoading(false); }; return (
